title: Create card review components: affirmation-card, card-flow, and summary
description:
Create three NEW components for the card-based affirmation review.

## 1. app/fo-09/components/affirmation-card.tsx

Single affirmation card with:
- Large card with affirmation text (centered, prominent)
- Two buttons below: "Love it" (primary/purple styling) and "Discard" (secondary/neutral styling)
- Slide-left exit animation using Framer Motion (current card slides out left, next slides in from right)
- Props: affirmation: string, onLove: () => void, onDiscard: () => void

## 2. app/fo-09/components/affirmation-card-flow.tsx

Orchestrates the card-by-card review of a batch of 5 affirmations:
- Progress bar at top with "3/5" style counter that fills as user advances
- Renders one AffirmationCard at a time
- Tracks loved and discarded arrays internally
- Calls onComplete(loved: string[], discarded: string[]) when all 5 reviewed
- Uses AnimatePresence for slide-left transitions between cards

Props: affirmations: string[], onComplete: (loved: string[], discarded: string[]) => void

## 3. app/fo-09/components/affirmation-summary.tsx

Shows loved affirmations after reviewing a batch:
- Heading: "Your affirmations" or similar
- Flat list of all loved affirmations (no batch distinction)
- Count: "X affirmations collected"
- If affirmations exist: two buttons:
  - "I am good with these" (primary, purple) -> calls onDone()
  - "I want to create more" (secondary) -> calls onMore()
- If no affirmations: message "None of those resonated? Let us try again." + single "Generate new affirmations" button -> calls onMore()

Props: lovedAffirmations: string[], onDone: () => void, onMore: () => void

All components use Framer Motion for animations and follow FO-08 dark theme styling (gray-900 bg, gray-200 text, purple accents).

Files to create:
- app/fo-09/components/affirmation-card.tsx
- app/fo-09/components/affirmation-card-flow.tsx
- app/fo-09/components/affirmation-summary.tsx

Do not close until acceptance criteria pass.
acceptance_criteria: All 3 files exist in app/fo-09/components/ AND npm run build succeeds
